description: Full list of successful bids from the Community Ownership Fund.

details.body:
Successful bids

The Community Ownership Fund has awarded £135 million to 409 projects across the UK, with £93.4 million allocated to 283 projects across England, £22 million allocated to 57 projects in Scotland, £8.8 million to 30 projects in Wales and £11.4 million to 39 projects in Northern Ireland. The full list of successful bids can be found in the table below.
